comments.body: I think we usually say "closest enclosing" rather than "ambient"

@HansMuller I'm wondering if the override callback should take in a single argument for `BuildContext` so that the callback has access to the same BuildContext as the original behavior. 

I know we don't do this elsewhere with other buttons like [FlatButton], but I'm curious on how we decide whether to expose it or not.

`VoidCallback` is already powerful enough to allow access of different level `BuildContext`. Explicit passing in `BuildContext` might be redundant.
See https://dartpad.dev/5332c6160b0d14cdc28e2834faa3bc6c
